trans-unit.source: Defines a collection that stores <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> objects.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> class from another <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: Az aktuális index <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref> , ahol az új <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> helyeztek.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of an array of type <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> to the end of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> contains the specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: Az egydimenziós <xref:System.Array>átmásolva érték, amely a cél <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The index into `array` to begin copying.
trans-unit.target: Az index `array` másolásához.

trans-unit.source: The array parameter is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: A array többdimenziós paramétere.

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of elements in the is greater than the available space between arrayIndex and the end of array.

trans-unit.target: Adja vissza, amely képes iterációt számbavevő a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
